description.raw:
I've moved the DRCVehiclePlugin from plugins to plugins/ros and added several ROS topics for controlling the vehicle.

To listen to the current actuator states:
/hand_wheel/state
/gas_pedal/state
/brake_pedal/state

To set an actuator command:
/hand_wheel/cmd
/gas_pedal/cmd
/brake_pedal/cmd

The state messages are currently broadcast at 1 Hz. The public method DRCVehiclePlugin::SetPublishRate can change the broadcast rate (similar to gazebo::Sensor::SetUpdateRate), but it is not yet connected to anything.
